item.title: I've got two, yes two, consent training courses next month online. One for US folks (over two afternoons UK time) and one all day course for UK folks. #folks #RSE #consent
item.dc:creator: @BISHSexEd
item.description:

item.title: R to @BISHSexEd: If you can fund me to do this kind of work I'd really really appreciate it. I compete with big media companies, the right, period tracker apps, and porn companies doing sex ed. Mine is better, more ethical, and has no ads. My work relies on you. https://www.patreon.com/BISHuk
item.dc:creator: @BISHSexEd
item.description: If you can fund me to do this kind of work I'd really really appreciate it. I compete with big media companies, the right, period tracker apps, and porn companies doing sex ed. Mine is better, more ethical, and has no ads. My work relies on you. patreon.com/BISHuk

item.title: R to @BISHSexEd: And a lot of us are sad at the moment because of world events ¬gestures broadly¬ Were you ever taught that it was okay to be sad? Or how to feel sad? Me neither. Hope this helps us all. https://www.bishuk.com/about-you/how-to-be-sad/

item.title: R to @BISHSexEd: Bish gets loads of Qs like this "I’m a 17-year-old bi girl, currently in a relationship with a girl.... I like to do masturbation and oral on her, but whenever she tries to return the favor I feel kind of uncomfortable, and rarely get pleasure from it." https://www.bishuk.com/your-questions/is-it-normal-that-i-only-want-to-give-and-not-receive-during-sex/
item.dc:creator: @BISHSexEd
item.description: Bish gets loads of Qs like this "I’m a 17-year-old bi girl, currently in a relationship with a girl.... I like to do masturbation and oral on her, but whenever she tries to return the favor I feel kind of uncomfortable, and rarely get pleasure from it." bishuk.com/your-questions/is…

item.title: R to @BISHSexEd: Usually resources about bullying are basically 'damn sorry, uh, here's how to avoid it.' This one is about how it happens, why it's to do with scarcity and power, and what we can do about it. (if we don't see it, we are probably benefitting from it) https://www.bishuk.com/relationships/how-bullying-happens/
item.dc:creator: @BISHSexEd
item.description: Usually resources about bullying are basically 'damn sorry, uh, here's how to avoid it.' This one is about how it happens, why it's to do with scarcity and power, and what we can do about it. (if we don't see it, we are probably benefitting from it) bishuk.com/relationships/how…

item.title: R to @BISHSexEd: And in order to do that, you have to be able to have trust in your relationships. But how? Particularly if you haven't been able to trust people in the past? https://www.bishuk.com/relationships/trust-in-relationships/

item.title: R to @BISHSexEd: If we didn't live in a world that assumed 'normal' (sexualities, genders, relationship models) we wouldn't have to 'come out'. I say 'telling people big news about us'. Anyway, here's how https://www.bishuk.com/about-you/how-to-tell-people-big-news-about-us/

item.title: R to @BISHSexEd: Topping and bottoming is confusing and is about gender, gender roles, sexuality, but also about power and communication. I try to explain that here https://www.bishuk.com/sex/top-bottom-mean/

item.description: Topping and bottoming is confusing and is about gender, gender roles, sexuality, but also about power and communication. I try to explain that here bishuk.com/sex/top-bottom-me…

item.title: R to @BISHSexEd: This module of the Teach Yourself Sex Ed course is about Gender, You, and Culture. You probably didn't get sex ed as good as this at school. Sorry about that. https://www.bishuk.com/parents/teach-yourself-sex-ed-gender-you-and-culture/

item.title: R to @BISHSexEd: Sexuality is something that we all have. So why not think about yours in a bit of detail? It might also reveal what you can do to help others to do / become theirs https://www.bishuk.com/about-you/whats-your-sexuality/

item.title: R to @BISHSexEd: Here's one on how to understand power and privilege in terms of solidarity. Why it's in all our interests to have a more inclusive world (and why power and privilege is as much about what we can bring to the party as much as what we are not allowed to) https://www.bishuk.com/about-you/solidarity/
item.dc:creator: @BISHSexEd

item.title: Happy #pride #prideday for everyone marking or celebrating it. Though I (Justin) am not queer, I try to do queer sex ed. So here are some resources

item.title:
RT by @BISHSexEd: Why it doesn't really matter how you masturbate, and why you should be careful about where you get your sex ed from...
https://www.bishuk.com/your-questions/i-cant-masturbate-the-conventional-way/
item.dc:creator: @BISHSexEd
item.description:
Why it doesn't really matter how you masturbate, and why you should be careful about where you get your sex ed from...

bishuk.com/your-questions/i-…

item.title: It’s fine to masturbate however you like. The way you do it *might* be one of the things you *could* consider *if* you were having sexual problems with a partner. But if you’re not, just enjoy it. Also, careful where you get your sex education. https://www.bishuk.com/your-questions/i-cant-masturbate-the-conventional-way/
item.dc:creator: @BISHSexEd
item.description:
It’s fine to masturbate however you like. The way you do it *might* be one of the things you *could* consider *if* you were having sexual problems with a partner. But if you’re not, just enjoy it. Also, careful where you get your sex education.
bishuk.com/your-questions/i-…

item.title: RT by @BISHSexEd: Let's get beyond the discourses of 'what consent is / isn't' and instead get to the nitty gritty of what consent might do and how we might do it. For educators or anyone who wants to bring more consent into their workplace. Jul 13. Places are limited. https://www.eventbrite.com/e/consent-training-course-tickets-311686652167
